divs: sighting detailsbright light went towards my right from far up in the sky as if it were going towards the earths orbit then it disappeared. 2 minutes later i noticed it flying back still high way above the clouds going left then disappeared after a 1 to 1 1\2 minutes. then 3-5 minutes later i noticed it back to my left going about 10 seconds then it disappeared again. was a bight white looking glow, was too far high up for me to notice exact detail. i was in my back yard on the phone with my sister and my daughter was with me and i was counting planes when i notice object going three directions. with in 15 min span time. looked as if object was moving fast, faster than the usual airplane speed. my feeling are amazed which i hope i got to see my first possible ufo not the typical ifo's. i am a strong believer and will admit i had an encounter with i believe was a gray. i know this sounds crazy but the possibilities are unknown. anyways i will keep and eye out a lot more often.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Keller
There were no other sightings in Keller on or around September 22nd 2011
Summary: bright light moved three different directions way above airplaine traffic
